title: Spatchcock chicken with fennel and mango salad
description: A tasty, simple and fast way to cook a whole chicken on the barbecue. Add a little spice to the marinade if you like - it will complement the fruity salad.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
extra virgin olive oil or butter
2 mangoes, peeled, stone removed, flesh cut into 1cm/½ in cubes or 5mm/¼in slices
2 fennel bulbs, trimmed and cut lengthways into thin slices
